items.title: Median age of companies going public rises to 13
items.description: CNBC's Robert Frank reports on the shifting strategy for startups.

items.title: Startups are staying private longer thanks to alternative capital
items.description: The median age of companies that have gone private so far this year is 13 years since founding, up from a median of 10 years in 2018, according to new...

items.title: The wealth of the top 1% reaches a record $52 trillion
items.description: All wealth groups saw gains over the past year, according to recent Fed data. But the growth has been fastest for those at the very top.

items.title: Top 10% see record wealth growth: Here's what to know
items.description: The top 1% of Americans has seen their wealth grow to record levels so far this year. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the details.

items.title: The global wealthy are lining up for Trump's $1 million Gold Card after price cut
items.description: Advisors to the ultra-wealthy said their clients are keen to access the U.S. education system, health care system, banking system and financial market...
